about_the_game:
✦Character Introduction✦

Tachibana Konomi a cheerful island woman who has developed into an incredibly sexy.

She eats well, sleeps well, and helps with household chores, making her the ideal partner. Her voluptuous body is completely inherited from her mother.

In the original story, she becomes the protagonist's partner, and they engage in passionate sex every day.

Body is incredibly soft, with healthy, supple skin that feels like it clings to your hands.

Loves the protagonist deeply and happily complies with anything he says.

She is aware of being a "boob monster" and feels delighted when the protagonist plays with her.

Hips are so ideal for childbirth that her shorts end up looking like provocative denim.

Her personality is secretly perverted; she often sneaks into the changing room to sniff the protagonist's underwear.

Even when the protagonist is away, she frequently masturbates and reaches climax often.

✦ How to Play✦

Use your mouse to control the following areas by dragging them:

◆Head ◆Torso ◆Breasts ◆Thighs ◆Pleasurer

Each part moves in a different way.

Try your hand at controlling the different parts to find the best method for you (or her).

You can also smack the following areas by double-clicking them:

◆Head ◆Stomach ◆Breasts ◆Thighs

Smack your masochistic mistress in an effective manner to tame the beast.

While dragging each of the areas to pull or twist them is all well and good, you can also use the Multi-Rec function to take your game to the next level.

This function allows you to make multiple recordings of the same scene. For example, on your first recording you might choose to move your body, while on the second recording you could feel up her breasts. Piece together your own combination of moves to create a unique film.

Go ahead and try your hand at filming a scene you've always dreamed of!

✦ An array of camera effects at your fingertips! ✦

  • Character-lighting adjusts based on the preset backgrounds

Evening or nighttime backgrounds are dimmer, helping to create a sexier mood.

  • An array of camera effects

Choose from 3 different camera effects: background light source, light diffusion, and rim lighting! Have fun filming your own moody scenes.

  • Upload your favorite images or videos to use in the background

You can upload jpg/png/mp4 files into the game to use as background material.

Recreate scenes of your dreams by uploading your own images or videos.

  • Free in-game video-recording function!

Export your animation as an .mp4 whenever you please!

✦ Sync it to your electric onaho! ✦

Connect your MOMONII Electric Onaho via Bluetooth on the PC or Android versions of the game for some extra fun!

Go on and put yourself in his shoes for the ultimate experience. You know you want to.

✦ Emotion engine ecstasy! ✦

The 3 parameters (Impatience, Pleasure, and Pain) affect her facial expressions as they shift.

Sudden violent movements may turn her pleasure into pain, causing her to grimace.

Whether she melts into throes of ecstasy or grimaces in pain all depends on your handling of her.

Her state-of-mind is reflected on the Emotion Meter to the top-left of the screen.

Here's what each symbol means:

  • Heart:  Pleasure

  • Yellow ring:  Impatience

  • Red ring:  Pain

(You can also enable the Emotion Graph in settings to see how the intensity of stimulation affects her. This can be handy when you're having trouble getting a grasp of her emotions.)

❤ Reasoning and Masochist Meters

Her Reasoning and Masochist meters fluctuate when you make her climax through sheer pleasure or with some pain.

Even if you apply the same stimulation, her emotions will change depending on the state of her Reasoning and Masochist Meters.

Keep taming her and make her a slave to pleasure.

❤ A variety of fun features to dive into!

  • Log-in Bonuses

Once you've started your game, you will receive log-in bonuses every day (23 hours after claiming your previous bonus).

Gems, which are required to unlock some features, can be received through log-in bonuses.

They can also be received through Climax Bonuses.

  • Climax Bonuses

Receive lots of Gems as bonuses by making her climax up to 20 times a day. She will become more Impatient if you don't manage to make her climax properly.

Use the Multi-Rec function to feel-up different parts of her body at the same time.

She's sure to melt into a satisfied pile of pleasure if you stimulate multiple areas at once!

❤ Use short-cuts to power-up your pleasure!

Figure out your favorite situations through the variety of features available.

Use the Favorites function to save up to 14 different shortcuts (Selecting the hamburger icon on the top-right of the settings menu will open up the shortcuts menu). You can also save up to 5 different preset configurations.

Saving your favorite combination of settings as a preset option will let you get right into the action to create the perfect scene.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content. The sexual content in this game includes  missionary-style sex

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6870 DirectX 版本: 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound
